column2: we were seated at our booth and immediately met our server
column3: Kaitlin (hopefully I spelled that correctly). This girl is bubbly energy on a golden chopstick. Fun
column6: and welcoming. My company and I were ready to order but still couldn't make up what was and wasn't vegan. When Kaitlin heard that
column7: she excitedly requested for our menus
column9: and immediately returned with a vegetarian/vegan menu. This menu had us in awe of our true options as we saw that there was no lack. After a few recommendations
column10: we settled with the vegetarian six course tasting menu. Can somebody say godsend? Godsend!
